attributes.action: To protect the crown mark on British beer/lager, pint/half pint/spirts glasses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We do not need a EU ruling that states,
that glasses that are served in pubs/clubs etc, have to be marked with a 'CE' marking, as the 'Crown' mark, which has already existed for 308 years
(without a break!) works well. This is just a another wasteless EU dictatk that this goverment should ignore.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
